subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : The mean free path of gas molecules is inversely proportional to square of molecular diameter. Statement (II) : Average kinetic energy of gas molecules is directly the options given below :

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
